ink.base.connectors.AbstractConnector¶

class ink.base.connectors.AbstractConnector¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract Connector class Can be used to implement new types of connectors.

The only function which have to be implemented is the query(self, str) function. This function is used to query the neighborhood. Makes sure this function return a dictionary in the correct format.

__init__()¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

__init__()

Initialize self.

query(q_str)

Abstract query function.
abstract query(q_str)¶

Abstract query function. :param q_str: Query string. :type q_str: str :rtype: dict
